oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Anderson, John, 1836 January 12
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of John Anderson, Senior, dated January 12th, 1836. Illustrates the first page of the document. Anderson’s will was “recorded in Book No. 11, Pages 21 & 22” in Davidson County, Tennessee. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Anderson family
